description: This design embodies a blend of modern and classic web aesthetics, featuring a clean layout with ample whitespace and a muted color palette that exudes calm. The top banner utilizes an artistic image overlay with a textual emphasis on 'CSS Zen Garden,' setting an inspirational tone. The typography is elegant and easily readable, complementing the overall serene and educational theme of the design. A sidebar navigation menu efficiently organizes links in a concise manner with a straightforward list format, enhancing usability.
